pr_title: Improvements to the PDL translation task.

timeline.author: junchuanwang

timeline.bodyText:
I understand you want to show them in two lines, but following code would feel better
LOGGER.error("To see the difference between source and tanslated schemas, run: \n diff {} {}", sourceFile.getAbsolutePath(), destFile.getAbsolutePath());
timeline.author: junchuanwang

timeline.message:
Improvements to the PDL translation task.
 - Add option to skip verification.
 - Don't failfast on errors while loading schemas.
 - Write schemas failing verification to temp location to diff them
   easily.
 - Strip trailing whitespaces in PDL.
